citations.narrative:
Storage. There were 3 bags of open shavings on the floor of the animal room. Open food and bedding supplies can cause
pest problems, contamination of supplies, and can increase health risks to the animals. Supplies of food and bedding
must be stored in a manner that adequately protects supplies from pests and contamination. Correct by May 6, 2023.

Pest Control. A bird's nest was observed on a shelf in the animal room. Bird droppings can contaminate animal
enclosures, food and bedding supplies, and expose the rabbits to disease risks. An effective pest control program must
be established and maintained to control birds from entering and nesting in the rabbit room. Correct by May 11, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
n

narrative:
3.50(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Storage. There were 3 bags of open shavings on the floor of the animal room. Open food and bedding supplies can cause 
pest problems, contamination of supplies, and can increase health risks to the animals. Supplies of food and bedding 
must be stored in a manner that adequately protects supplies from pests and contamination. Correct by May 6, 2023. 
3.56(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
Pest Control. A bird's nest was observed on a shelf in the animal room. Bird droppings can contaminate animal 
enclosures, food and bedding supplies, and expose the rabbits to disease risks. An effective pest control program must 
be established and maintained to control birds from entering and nesting in the rabbit room. Correct by May 11, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
